smile.plot.swing

Class ScatterPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.plot.swing.Shape
      • smile.plot.swing.Plot
        • smile.plot.swing.ScatterPlot

  • public class ScatterPlot
extends Plot
    The data is displayed as a collection of points.
